reviews.review: Фримен… Гордон Фримен… это имя знает любой уважающий себя геймер. Half life это то с чего собственно и началась одна из самых популярнейших серий игр. В свое время игра была невероятным прорывом в истории компьютерных игр, и мир узнал кто такой Гордон Фримен.За всю игру Гордон не промолвил ни слова и безжалостно истреблял монстров, которые в результате неудачного эксперимента ворвались в наш мир.Когда я проходил эту игру впервые, то был восхищен потрясающим геймплеем, отличнейшей графикой и неимоверно затягивающим сюжетом. Помню как с друзьями после школы играли в неё в компьютерном клубе по мультиплееру, один на один, два на два и.т.д.Сейчас я уже воспринимаю Half Life как игру которая изменила многое как в игровой индустрии так и в моем понимании о компьютерных играх. В наше время она уже не так востребована как ранее, но в неё до сих пор играет множество геймеров по всему миру.

This game is an amazing classic.  It provides hours of fun, while  keeping the player thinking about how to overcome the various challenges.

Also, if you grew up playing the original disk version, like I did, then you'll be happy to know that in this version, there's an option to enable HD textures and models, which makes the game look a lot better.

The atmosphere in this game is absolutely amazing. Sure the graphics aren't the greatest, and the protagonist (Gordon Freeman) has a limited personality, but the sounds, effects, AI intelligence, and the suspense are amazing. This game is a milestone in RPG games, and has more depth than games that also came out around that time like Doom. The whole world in Half-Life is carefully crafted to make you question what is going to happen next.

Half Life scared me so much when I was a kid, so I never really got to experience it until I picked it up on Steam. I am so glad I did. This game is stupid hard, fantastically entertaining and incredibly ahead of its time. The graphics may be dated, but it still plays nearly as well as its 2003 sequel. Pick this game up!

Esse é um dos maiores clássicos do PC e só quem viveu aquela época tem idéia do impacto que esse jogo causou, quando você análisa os outros jogos da mesma época (Quake 2, Heretic, Delta Force, etc.) nota a disparidade do HL1 com relação a esses jogos, eu joguei um pouco na época, porém só finalizei o jogo agora em 2016 e que jogo bom, mesmo com quase 20 anos, continua com uma jogabilidade boa e estória interessante. Se você não jogou, pare de ler e jogue agora. É obrigatório.

I'm not good at writing reviews but here it goes
Pros:
+Graphics are outstanding (for a game that was developed in 1998)
+Gameplay is nice
+The game is challenging you won't be able to beat this game easily in Short It's not your average run and shoot game instead of hunting down waves after waves of enemies there are a lot of puzzles in the game you have to solve in order to proceed to next level only intelligent people are able to do so (Seriously)
+Great soundtracks
+Physics is perfect (almost)
+Maps are very detailed (for a game developed in GoldSrc Engine)
+Variety of weapons (about 13-15)
+Hard to beat enemies
+Great Environment (The feeling of being alone and surrounded by enemies from all sides)
+Multiplayer (Deathmatch)
+Mods Support

Cons:
-Few minor Bugs (But the game is still playable)
-No Half-Life 3 :l

Overall rating:-
9/10
Nominated For The "Even Better Than I Thought Award"
Nominated For The "Labor Of Love Award"

Una delle esperienze videoludiche più traumatiche della mia vita. L'ho finito solo perchè sono molto incuriosito dal 2 e molti dei miei amici mi hanno detto che è molto più curato.
Ha praticamente sbagliato qualsiasi cosa si possa sbagliare in un FPS. 
-Longevità eccessiva per ciò che offre.
- Una marea di fasi "strane" e particolari per variare il gameplay in modo stupido e frustrante.
- Nemici che ti DEVASTANO con 2 colpi e te con 100 colpi di mitragliatore forse li lasci in fin di vita.
- Gestione delle zone di recupero HP pessima, a volte ne trovi molte in poco tempom a volte scompaiono per ore.
- Level design terribile che tenta di essere elaborato e complesso come un Duke Nukem 3D, Quake o Doom, portando solo a confusione, modi di proseguire cripitici e strade che non si vedono perchè son spesso cunicoli nascosti nell'angolino di un muro. 
- LE FASI PLATFORM, GESù LE FASI PLATFORM. 
- Punti in cui sei innondato di nemici, trappole ovunque, dietro ogni angolo c'è un cecchino nascosto, un ponte che crolla, un fuoco che ti ammazza, un nemico dentro una cassa, un nemico dentro un tubo, un nemico che spawana coi teletrasporti dietro di te.
- Bug e glitch ovunque, ho dovuto ricaricare il save più di una dozzina di volte (la prima nell'intro addirittura) perchè Gordon si bloccava a caso in un punto nel muro.
- Lasciamo stare gli enigmi per carità.

Questo gioco è un disastro, un completo disastro, non si salva niente, sarebbe bello per l'atmosfera un po' alienante e angosciante che crea, specialmente nei primi 3 capitoli, poi però arrivano i militari, alieni con i lanciarazzi, diventa una guerra ALL OUT tra Gordon, gli alieni, i militari, caccia ed elicotteri e l'atmosfera va tutta a farsi fottere.
Odio sparare a zero sui giochi così, davvero non mi piace, ma è probabilmente una delle peggiore esperienze videoludiche della mia vita.

Что я могу сказать об игре,она прекрасна. А ведь когда то давно её создал человек которого попёрли из колледжа после чего он проработал 13 лет на кампанию Майкрософт.После чего основал кампанию Валв и создал этот шедевр игровой индустрии.У неё все плюсы:Сюжет,монстры.оружие и многое другое.Человек который читает мой обзор если тебе скучно и полно времени и есть вкус к приключениям и боевикам то игра для тебя.И надеюсь ты знаешь Англисский(если же нет то руссификатор в помощь).Графика конечно не огонь но игра стоит и сейчас своего внимания.Советую всем людям в стиме пройти данный шедевр.Моя оценка: 9.8/10
P.s: И помните:Играйте в хорошие игры).

Вдохни воздух Черной Мезы, закрой глаза и в панике начинай бить бегущего к тебе хендкраба монтировкой. Господи, прошло уже 18 лет, а Half-Life до сих пор считается одной из лучших игр в жанре шутеров. Графика - по тем временам - верх реализма, сейчас же - лучше чем в доброй половине современных игр. Сюжет - простой до невозможности, но в то же время очень и очень интересный. Выбор орудий убийства - не обширный, но вполне хватит повеселиться от души

10/10 расквашеных в кашу хедкрабов.

I've known about the Half-Life game since I was just a kid but never thought anything of it. It was included in a game bundle I had purchased, one day I just booted it up out of boredom/curiousity. My initial thoughts were wow this is so much like Portal 1 and 2 (not realizing until a few minutes later it was Valve developed) which really held my interest. After playing the first chapter or two I was hooked. It was one of those games I couldn't put down (rare for me) and continued all the way to the end. I can't believe I never knew how amazing this game was and why the series was so popular.

tl;dr Absolutely the best FPS (besides HL2) I have ever played.

This game is fun. Despite the fact that I'm used to more "modern" games I really enjoy playing Half-Life. I like the Half-Life games and I would recommend this game to anyone (but the people who say older games look like Minecraft).

A game that has stood the test of time. Unlike other shooters where its a "kill all who you see without a second thought" this game is more puzzle than anything. Need to get to that door all the way up there? Start figuring it out by moving boxes, raising the water level, pulling switches, etc. The expansions are great. A few minor bugs, mostly things like shaking models but nothing game breaking or game hindering, they're quite amusing actually.

This is the classic that started it all. This is the best game of 1998. This is the game I never played until now. This is Half-Life. You play the role of Gordon Freeman, a scientist who fights to survive the aftermath of an experiment gone horribly wrong. Combining fps gameplay with puzzle solving and a deep narrative, Half-Life 1 won over 50 awards since it's launch for best PC game. This the classic game everyone should own on Steam. Anyone who played this game should also play the remake Black Mesa.
